content: materials stylecraft special dk 100% premium acrylic 100 g / 295 m for my sample i used about 22 g yarn in total colour a - 1099 grey colour b - 1835 buttermilk 4 5 mm tunisian hook yarn needle scissors 2 buttons optional finished size about 9 5 x 17 cm the size can be adjusted by adding or reducing stitches and/or repeats the pattern has a four-row repeat and works in multiples of 4 stitches plus 1 gauge not crucial for this project skill level easy if you are unfamiliar with any of the stitches or techniques used the following links provide step-by- step explanations - foundation row - standard return pass - end stitch - binding off - tunisian simple stitch tss - colour change on the right-hand side the pattern uses one special stitch the extended tunisian front post double_crochet exttfpdc the colours are changed in each row at the end of the return pass on the right-hand side the special stitch and the colour change are explained on page 5 stitches and abbreviations used are listed on page 5 2024 -
